title: Week 5 Picks Against the Spread, Best Bets, Gambling Advice (Football 10/4)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco and R.J. for Week 5 gambling advice, covering all 14 games on Sunday and Monday. The guys discuss Steelers-Ravens (7:15), Chiefs-Colts (10:30), Bucs-Saints (13:20), Packers-Cowboys (17:45), Bills-Titans (23:10), 49ers-Browns (28:00), Patriots-Redskins (32:35), Falcons-Texans (35:35), Bears-Raiders (42:45), Vikings-Giants (46:30), Jets-Eagles (48:50), Broncos-Chargers (51:50), Cardinals-Bengals (54:40) and Jaguars-Panthers (56:40).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
